title: Ensuring Lawful Governance and Implementing the President's 'Department of Government Efficiency' Deregulatory Initiative
summary: Directs federal agencies to review significant regulations and identify those that are unlawful, ineffective, or overly burdensome.
full_text: Directs federal agencies to review significant regulations and identify those that are unlawful, ineffective, or overly burdensome.

university_impact_areas.name: Administrative Compliance
university_impact_areas.description: Compliance requirements, reporting mandates, and regulatory changes affecting university administration
